Game and Art Studio

About

Gvero's Pintokyo Games is a game and art studio, founded in Lausanne in 2019. The company's main services include development and commercialization of video games and digital art, as well as development of software including IT applications and software tools.

Tihomir, the founder, has more than twelve years of experience in software development and over two years of experience in art design. As a holder of a PhD in computer science from EPFL, he worked as a consultant at Itecor and as a data scientist at Credit Suisse.
